cauhoi.cauhoi: I didn’t think his the comments were very 'appropriate' at the time.
GCSE are not 'compulsory', but they are the most common qualifications taken by students
I received housing benefit when I was 'unemployed'.
The related publications are far too 'numerous' to list individually.
The teacher gave some 'suggestions' on what would come out for the examination.
When being interviewed, you should 'concentrate' on what the interviewer is saying or asking you
She came to the meeting late 'on purpose' so she would miss the introductory speech.
The use of lasers in surgery has become 'relatively' commonplace in recent years
The first few days at university can be very 'daunting', but with determination and positive attitude, freshmen will soon fit in with the new environment.
Did anyone 'acknowledge' responsibility for the outbreak of the fire ?
'Childbearing' is the women's most wonderful role.
In my experience, 'freshmen' today are different from those I knew 25 years ago
Mayo Hospital in New Orleans was so named in recognition of Dr. Mayo’s 'outstanding' humanitarianism.
My parents’ warnings didn’t 'deter' me from choosing the job of my dreams.
“It’s no use talking to me about metaphysics. It’s a 'closed book to me'.”
dapan: a subject that I don’t understand
a theme that I like to discuss
a book that is never opened
an object that I really love

cauhoi.cauhoi: Professor Berg was very interested in the 'diversity' of cultures all over the world.
The situation seems to be changing 'minute by minute'.
If desired, 'garnish' your plate with parsley, bell pepper rings or other vegetables
The bomb 'exploded' in the garage; fortunately no one hurt.
In times of war, the Red Cross is 'dedicated' to reducing the sufferings of wounded soldiers, civilians, and prisoners of war.

TracNghiem.name: Tìm câu cận nghĩa Tiếng Anh

cauhoi.cauhoi: I have never been to Russia. I think I shall go there next year.” said Bill.
dapan: Bill said that he had never been to Russia and he thought he would go there the next year.
Bill said that he would have never been to Russia and he thinks he would go there the next year.
Bill said that he had never been to Russia and he thinks he will go there the next year
Bill said that he has never been to Russia and he thinks he would go there the next year

cauhoi.cauhoi: People believed that Jane retired because of her poor health
dapan: Jane is believed to have retired because of her poor health
Jane was believed to have retired because of her poor health
It is believed that Jane retired because of her poor health
Jane retired because of her poor health was believed

cauhoi.cauhoi: The government knows the extent of the problem. The government needs to take action soon
dapan: The government knows the extent of the problem whereas it needs to take action soon.
The government knows the extent of the problem so that it needs to take action soon.
Knowing the extent of the problem, the government needs to take action soon.
The government knows the extent of the problem, or else it needs to take action soon

cauhoi.cauhoi: The substance is very toxic. Protective clothing must be worn at all times
dapan: Since the substance is very toxic, so protective clothing must be worn at all times
So toxic is the substance that protective clothing must be worn at all times.
The substance is such toxic that protective clothing must be worn at all times
The substance is too toxic to wear protective clothing at all times

cauhoi.cauhoi: John is studying hard. He doesn’t want to fail the exam
dapan: John is studying hard in Oder not to fail the next exam
John is studying hard in Oder that he not fail the next exam
John is studying hard so as to fail the next exam
hiJohn is studying hard in Oder to not to fail the next examnts

cauhoi.cauhoi: She gave in her notice. She planned to start her new job in January
dapan: She gave in her notice, plan to start her new job in January
She gave in her notice with a view to starting her new job in January
Her notice was given in with an aim to start her new job in January
Her notice was given in order for her to start her new job in January

cauhoi.cauhoi: When the unemployment rate is high, the crime rate is usually also high.
dapan: The unemployment rate and the crime rate are both higher.
The higher the unemployment rate is, the higher the crime rate is.
The unemployment rate is as high as the crime rate
The high rate of unemployment depends on the high rate of crime.

cauhoi.cauhoi: I wish you hadn't said that
dapan: I wish you not to say that
If only you didn't say tot
I hope you will not say that.
It would be nice if you hadn’t said that

cauhoi.cauhoi: The first few days at university can be very 'daunting', but with determination and positive attitude, freshmen will soon fit in with the new environment.
“You're always making terrible mistakes”, said the teacher.
dapan: The teacher asked his students why they always made terrible mistakes
The teacher realized that his students always made terrible mistakes
The teacher complained about his students making terrible mistakes
The teacher made his students not always make terrible mistakes

cauhoi.cauhoi: There is no point in your phoning Jane – she’s away
dapan: It would be a waste of time phoning Jane – she’s away
You waste your time if you insist on phoning Jane – she’s away.
Don’t spend your valuable time phoning Jane – she’s out.
Jane is very difficult to phone – she’s always away

cauhoi.cauhoi: We spend about one-third of our lives sleeping. We know relatively little about sleep.
dapan: We know relatively little about sleep; as a result, we spend about one-third of our lives sleeping.
We shall know more about sleep if we spend more than one-third of our lives sleeping
Despite spending about one-third of our lives sleeping, we know relatively little about sleep.
We spend about one-third of our lives sleeping so that we know relatively little about sleep

cauhoi.cauhoi: Overeating is a cause of several deadly diseases. Physical inactivity is another cause of several deadly diseases.
dapan: Not only overeating but also physical inactivity may lead to several deadly diseases.
Apart from physical activities, eating too much also contributes to several deadly diseases.
Both overeating and physical inactivity result from several deadly diseases.
Overeating and physical inactivity are caused by several deadly diseases.

cauhoi.cauhoi: 'Why don't we wear sunglasses?' our grandpa would say when we went out on bright sunny days.
dapan: Our grandpa used to suggest wearing sunglasses when we went out on bright sunny days.
Our grandpa would warn us against wearing sunglasses on bright sunny days.
Our grandpa asked us why we did not wear sunglasses when going out on bright sunny days.
Our grandpa reminded us of going out with sunglasses on bright sunny days.

cauhoi.cauhoi: I am sure he did not know that his brother graduated with flying colors.
dapan: He should not have been envious of his brother's achievement.
He cannot have known that his brother graduated with very high marks.
That his brother graduated with flying colors must have been appreciated by him.
He may not know that his brother is flying gradually up in a colorful balloon.

cauhoi.cauhoi: People say that Mr. Goldman gave nearly a million pounds to charity last year.
dapan: Mr. Goldman is said to have given nearly a million pounds to charity last year.
Mr. Goldman was said to have given nearly a million pounds to charity last year.
Nearly a million pounds was said to have been given to charity by Mr. Goldman last year.
Nearly a million pounds is said to be given to charity by Mr. Goldman last year.

cauhoi.cauhoi: The boy was too fat to run far.
dapan: The boy's fatness didn't stop him running far.
The boy had to run a lot because he was fat.
The boy became ill because he was too fat.
The boy was very fat and couldn't run far.

cauhoi.cauhoi: If he wrote to her, she would be happy.
dapan: When he wrote to her, she wasn't happy.
May be he'll write to her, and then she'll be happy.
He doesn't write to her, so she isn't happy.
She's happy because he has written to her.

cauhoi.cauhoi: Would you mind waiting outside the office?
dapan: Will you wait outside the office?
Did you wait outside the office?
Do you enjoy waiting outside the office?
Did you see anyone waiting outside the office?

cauhoi.cauhoi: The basketball team knew they lost the match. They soon started to blame each other.
dapan: Hardly had the basketball team known they lost the match when they started to blame each other.
No sooner had the basketball team started to blame each other than they knew they lost the match.
As soon as they blamed each other, the basketball team knew they lost the match.
Not only did the basketball team lose the match but they blamed each other as well.

cauhoi.cauhoi: The garage serviced my car last week.
dapan: I got my car serviced last week.
My car was to be serviced last week.
The garage’s service to my car was good.
Last week I went to the garage by cars.

cauhoi.cauhoi: When we went back to the bookstore, the bookseller _______ the book we wanted.
The director _______ for the meeting by the time I got to his office.
By the end of last summer, the farmers _______ all the crop
My mother told me she _______ very tired since she came back from a visit to our grandparents
Susan _______ her family after she had taken the university entrance examination.
How many cities you and your uncle _______ by July last summer?
Miss Jane _______ typing the report when her boss came in.
Peter was in New York last week; he _______ in Washington D.C. three days earlier.
Three women, none of whom we _______ before, _______ out of the hall
They _______ through horrible times during the war years.
Sam didn't get much formal _______.
Wow! What a _______ your sister is! I couldn't get off the phone!
He'll be remembered both as a brilliant footballer and as a true _______.
This season's _______ include five new plays and several concerts of Chinese and Indian music.
She was a _______ child, happiest when reading.
She seems to have spent all her life studying in _______ establishments.
Space travel is one of the marvels wonders of modern _______.
My computer makes a _______ low buzzing noise.
All her life she had a _______ trust in other people.
After he had spoken, a _______ silence fell on the room.

TracNghiem.name: trắc nghiệm Multiple Choice Nâng Cao

cauhoi.cauhoi: I’m afraid very few people know about the concert and almost no one will come. If only the posters _____________ on time.
Jimmy sent his mother a ___________ of flowers for her birthday.
My plans to travel around the world have _________ through because I couldn‟t save enough money.
“I thought you bought a new fountain pen last week?” “Yes, I did but I left it at home. Can I borrow _____________ for a moment?”
There are only a few minutes left, and the students is writing ________________.
A little farther down the street _______________.
dapan: is the inn I used to stay at
there is an inn where I used to stay in
the inn is the place where I used to stay
is there an inn in which I used to stay

cauhoi.cauhoi: Remember to appreciate what your friends do for you. You shouldn’t take them ________.
“I wonder if you could help me?” - “______________”
dapan: I’ll do my best. What’s the problem?

cauhoi.cauhoi: “ Don’t stay anywhere near the railway station at night. It’s dangerous.” - “_____________.”
dapan: They won’t like it, I bet.
Where on Earth have you been?

cauhoi.cauhoi: The opposition will be elected into government at the next election, without a ________ of a doubt.
She was ________ out of 115 applicants for the position of managing Director.
It seems that the world record for this event is almost impossible to ________
The smell was so bad that it completely ________ us off our food.
He has been waiting for this letter for days, and at ________ it has come.
It is ________opportunity to see African wildlife in its natural environment.
She seems to have spent all her life studying in _______ establishments.
Space travel is one of the marvels wonders of modern _______.
Peter and Thomas are talking about their mission. - Peter: “Is it important?” - Thomas: “________”
dapan: It’s a matter of life and death!

cauhoi.cauhoi: Ann is asking Mathew’s opinion after biology class. - Ann: “Does the global warming worry you?” - Mathew: “________”
dapan: I can’t bear to think about it.

cauhoi.cauhoi: Paul is a very _______ character, he is never relaxed with strangers.

TracNghiem.name: trắc nghiệm Tìm từ trái nghĩa

cauhoi.cauhoi: Using Facebook, you can 'post' update sayings about your life every day.
We ought to keep these proposals 'secret' from the chairman for the time being.
I have a 'modest' little glass fish tank where I keep a variety of small fish.
The majority of people in the town strongly 'support' the plans to build a new school.
We offer a 'speedy' and secure service of transferring money in less than 24 hours.
She went to live in another state after the break-up of her 'marriage'
Mr. Smith’s new neighbors appear to be very 'friendly'.
The Germany’s war hysteria has accounted for its people’s 'hostility' towards foreigners.
Population growth rates 'vary' among regions and even among countries within the same region.
I've put the cake on a 'high' shelf where he can't get at it.
She was always very 'hard-working' at school.
Certain courses are compulsory; others are 'optional' .
She must be very 'strong' to carry such a weight on her back.
Barry seems 'happy' enough working for himself.
The Red Cross is an international humanitarian agency dedicated to reducing the 'sufferings' of wounded soldiers, civilians and prisoners of war.
You did a 'beautiful' thing in helping those poor children.
He is writing a book on the representation of 'woman' in medieval art.
In the first two decades of its existence, the cinema developed 'rapidly'.
The earth is being 'threatened' and the future looks bad.
I’d like to 'pay some money into' my bank account.
